CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Employment_Band__c , "6"),0, If(ISPICKVAL(Months_from_Start_Date__c, "1"), 2500, If(ISPICKVAL(Months_from_Start_Date__c, "2"), 5000, If(ISPICKVAL(Months_from_Start_Date__c, "3"), 10000, IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Months_from_Start_Date__c, "4+"), (ISPICKVAL( Employment_Band__c , "2"))), 20000, 17000)))))
CustomField.label: Personal Revenue Target
